articles.author: World Health Organization: WHO
articles.title: WHO/Europe and ECDC report reveals increasing numbers living with undiagnosed HIV in the Region - World Health Organization
articles.description:
Under-diagnosis of HIV in the European Region means hundreds of thousands are not getting the care they need when they need it, new data shows. 

A new report to be launched on World AIDS Day, jointly published by the WHO Regional Office for Europe an…

articles.title: Euro zone inflation rate eases slightly to 10% as surge in energy prices slows - CNBC
articles.description: Euro zone inflation eased in November, but the European Central Bank remains under pressure to deal with the recent record rise in prices.
articles.content:
Inflation in the euro zone slowed slightly in November, according to preliminary figures out Wednesday, with prices coming off record highs and missing analyst expectations.

articles.title: Europe's first Mars rover Rosalind Franklin now set to launch in 2028 - SiliconRepublic.com
articles.description: Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, member states have invested €360m to ensure the Rosalind Franklin rover lands on Mars.
articles.content:
